title: FoSCL Quiz Night
text: We are repeating our very successful Quiz.

This year it will be held in the School Hall. Our Quiz masters will provide a great range of interesting questions. We will have a bar with wine, beer, soft drinks and nibbles available. There will be a raffle with a variety of wonderful prizes.
tickets: Tickets on sale at the Library or Occasions.

title: Short Story Competition
text: The winners of this years competition will be annouced and prizes awarded.

link.text: Follow this link for more information

title: The Library Lion
text: Untied Artists will be performing “The Library Lion”. A fun and entertaining event for younger children to kick off half-term week.
Suitable for those aged 4 to 7 years. Children must be accompanied.
tickets: Tickets £3 for a child, £5 for two siblings. Full details and tickets available from the library.

title: AGM
text: The agenda will be sent out during October.
